# 4th Golden Melody Awards

| location       = Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall, Taipei, Taiwan
| host           = Timothy ChaoTu Min
| network        = CTS
| runtime        =
| ratings        =
| previous       = 3rd
| main           = Golden Melody Awards
| next           = 5th

The 4th Golden Melody Awards ceremony () was held at the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall in Taipei on November 21, 1992.
